name: APIContractSecurityAudit
description: Security Audit discovers your OpenAPI files, and checks and scores them for well-formedess and security.
author: 42Crunch

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: Enter the API key to authenticate to 42Crunch Platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add variable with this name to variables of the pipeline and set it to the API Key from 42Crunch Platform [See details](https://42crunch.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PLATFORM/pages/743014819/CI+CD+integration)

inputs.name: collectionName
inputs.label: Enter a name for the API collection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The API collection where the discovered OpenAPI files are stored. If the specified collection does not exist, it is created. If the specified collection already exists, the APIs in it are removed and replaced with the discovered ones. [See details](https://42crunch.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PLATFORM/pages/743014819/CI+CD+integration)

inputs.name: minScore
inputs.label: Minimum score for OpenAPI files
inputs.helpMarkDown: The minimum API score that the found APIs must reach in the audit. If any of the OpenAPI files found does score lower than the minimum score you set, the whole task fails. [See details](https://42crunch.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PLATFORM/pages/743014819/CI+CD+integration)
